comments.message: I’m not one to complain but if I’m paying extra for delivery charges and am waiting for an hour for my food to arrive, I hope that the food will at least taste decent. My milo tasted like water, my Chocolate sundae was liquify and my nuggets were cold. McDonald’s please train your staff to have some sort of quality control. It is really upsetting especially when you haven’t had your dinner yet. If you are going to take an hour to deliver, u should suggest customers to not order. Hope this will be included in some SOP. This is the 2nd time I’m facing such issues.
Why you ate my bacon!!!! I need an explanation from McDonald!

Dear McDonald's. Can you please not lie to your customers and say you are open 24/7 when in fact you are not. I got refused at 2 locations because of "system updates" when all i wanted was something to eat. I guess it is just easier to say 24/7 than to actually be open and accepting of business even for a short delay. Either way, this is a lie and now i will have to find a different food source and will probably never try McDonald's again. 
This is also not the first time but it will be the last
2 same order. One without bacon. Which is right? Did your staff finish the bacon or did they give special bacons for one of it?
Ordered upsize meal, and this is what I get. Only half the fries I ordered. Plz fix your service as well during your downtime

Very disappointed with the service of rider and manager over at the outlet . Supposed to deliver on time as stated by  you guys and you all took 2.5 hours to deliver just because you claim not enough riders ? Tried calling in call center and all you guys could say get back to me but yet I have to keep calling to enquiry about wherebout of my food? I am going to complain to the higher management about this issue .
In the meantime I will think of Quarter Pounder..
Bryant Khoo our double mcspicy
Mohamad Shah

0.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0400 hours to 0600 hours on 12 December 2017. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website, mobile app and hotline during this period. You may wish to visit our 24 hrs restaurants. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.

comments.message: Truly disappointed. Saw your post and thought the lack of cheese issue was solved. Ordered a cheesy loaded w extra cheese n bacon and what I got was this, barely enough cheese for the fries at bottom. I even asked the counter if they were sure this was extra cheese!

Cheesy loaded lies from McDonald's Plaza Singapura. More sour cream than anything else. 

When I asked for a proper amount of cheese sauce to be added, I was told that "additional" cheese sauce would be charged at an additional 30 cents. I was also told that this was the "standard amount".

Have you seen the cheese fries from your competitor next door, KFC? They're actually covered in cheese sauce and they've never disappointed me. 

If this is your standard amount of cheese sauce, I'll be happy to eat next door at an establishment that actually has standards for their cheese fries.

Hi Mac Donald’s 
I am just wondering why a breakfast ala carte fillet o fish cost $2.70 versus a a same $2.50 ala carte fillet o fish in the afternoon ?
Why the price difference ?
Also what happened to the cheese ? It’s not a full slice anymore ? I did not notice the change of size in your cheese until I tasted the fillet to be very dry and hard that I opened up my burger to take a look ooh it’s so sad !!
Please get it right the first time Mac Donald’s I grew up with your restaurant and I always get the idea that it’s the happiest place on earth to be inside a Mac Donald’s place as a child  
So Pls fiercely protect the brand and image  that you have built by giving us customers what you promise 
Thank you !
Your filet o fish was a disappointment as well, the fish fillet was so dry I think it is some left over from the night before?

Mine doesn’t even have sour cream, only that pathetic bit of cheese sauce. 
Save those bacon bits ! Really don’t need that , just give more cheese sauce and sour cream or mayonnaise! Live up to the word you used “ Loaded” ! 
Look at what I got in Texas Chicken! This is what I call Cheese Loaded Fries !

TOP pic is what my hubby and I got: pathetic amount of cheese and sour cream. He couldn't wait and ate some fries (which explained why there were less fries). The bottom pic is my fries after I brought it to the counter to voice my serious unhappiness. At first, the manager did not want to top up more cheese and sour cream for me. I showed her the advertised McDonalds Cheesy Loaded Fries and asked her to take a look at what I had received. She said ok and got a staff to squeeze some little bit of cheese onto my portion of fries. I told her that KFC's cheese fries gives a lot of cheese and I quote, she said, 'Oh we don't give that kind of amount.' End quote. 
McDonald's, we did pay to get CHEESY LOADED FRIES, or so I thought. 
Very upset with the manager's handling.

This is what you get for adding $0.30 cents of cheese...
If you wanna charge for cheese and you are not willing to give, why charge?
IVE BEEN ROBBED .... WHERE IS MY BACON BITS.. Pathetic.. tho Macdonald claims they will improve but i dont tink so.. KFC serves better
Hope you made improvements... we just had this bucket of cheese fries at Winter Wonderland and we were like 😲😲😲😲😲 look at that cheese!

Where is my bacon?
Staff have a taste of it just like the recent video that is viral..
Disappointing for the short change with it and fast food took more than 30mins while my other friend who came late 10mins and got her food 10 mins earlier at T2

Terrible experience I had. I was hungry at 215am so I drove to a 24hr outlet at Bedok North. I was ok with the lacklustre of the cheese in the chees fries but the final straw was the Angus burger I consumed. The bun was so hard that chewing the burger was not enjoyable at all and I could not even bite without stressing my jaws. As usual, the cheesy load fries was pathetic. Cheese given was probably the length of 2 fries and that is all. No idea why the cheese are so limited, was it instructed by the supervisors?(Mind you, my 2nd time having the cheese fries with limited cheese)
Hope to see improvement. We top up additional $0.80 for the cheese fries and realised it is not worth the additional top-up.

This was taken last week and really thumbs up to the mc team for coming up with this yummy cheese and sour cream fries!! I want more! Can’t wait to try the improved version!! 🍟🍟🍟 Anson road drive thru mac was where I ate at during lunch

Go and try kfc cheese fries. That's a standard.  We don't need so much on the bacon bits but the sauces in particular.

McDonald's is this what you guys are still serving after so many complain? I don't understand what is so hard by giving a decent amount of cheese sauce. Does it really cost that much?! I am so disappointed. Looks like I am not the only one.
All talk but no change?

Ya pls add the right amount

Pls stop asking rats to do the saucing becos their hand is too small

What is going on.... Sean Ow YongLamo Pyro
A step in the right direction... Now bring back quarter pounders. The Angus stuff just doesn't compare.
Please give your staff measuring equipment for the consistent portion of cheese, sour cream and bacon served. We do not expect human's hand and eyes to be reliable.

1.post_text: We know that sweet dreams are made of cheese (and sour cream) and it's nacho fault. We’ve relooked our processes to ensure that we load up the right amount of sauces so you won’t get cheesed-off. We’re grateful for your understanding!

comments.message: This is PATHETIC! Seems like McDonald's is not sincere when they said wanna do cheesy loaded fries. Where's the cheese????????????? This need to go viral so that people will know what they will get.
Love it! I am hooked. Trying the Original Angus next

Tried McDonald’s new Classic Angus Cheese burger and Cheesy “Loaded” Fries and here’s the review. 

It’s a decent replacement for the quarter pounder but as for the cheesy loaded fries, it’s a big fat “loaded” scam. 

There was hardly any cheese on the fries, much less “loaded”. When I asked for more cheese, they said they needed to charge another 30 cents. 

I paid the 30 cents anyway just to see how much more cheese it gets me. The staff squeezed the bottle lightly and returned the cheese fries back to me. 

Even with the top up, it was nowhere near “loaded”. 

Suffice to say, you are better off going to KFC if you want your cheese fries fix. The fries at KFC comes at nearly half the price and they are more generous with their cheese.

TLDR: Angus burger good. Cheese Fries bad. Buy KFC cheese fries instead.

Is lousy! Not advisable to buy. It doesn't comes with battery for a plastic $6 toy. Need buy AAA batteries 3 pieces. And the funniest part is the wind is coming out from top of you head. So you need to hold the fan and tilt it in such a way that the wind can blow onto you. And while u hold and tilt, be careful of the bunny ears as it is sticking upright,  it may poke your eyes. So it might be dangerous!

21.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0400 hours to 0530 hours on 22 November 2017. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website, mobile app and hotline during this period. You may wish to visit our 24 hrs restaurants during this time. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.

Even heroes need a yummy treat. Enjoy this delectable 1-for-1 deal before it’s gone! Limited time only. Visit your nearest McDonald’s today!
 
*Visuals are for illustration purposes only. Available only after breakfast hours, while stocks last. Promotion is only applicable to ala-carte purchase, and free item is only applicable to same item purchased. Promotion is not valid at Gardens by the Bay, iFly Singapore, LIDO, Resort World Sentosa, NTU, NUS, Singapore Polytechnic and Temasek Polytechnic. Products may be flavoured. For more information on product and allergens, visit mcdonalds.com.sg/justforyouSG

23.post_text: We know you love our Cones. So how about passing on some happiness this November! Simply purchase a Vanilla Cone at McDonald’s, and donate another Vanilla Cone (worth 80 cents) to Ronald McDonald House Charities (RMHC) Singapore! RMHC Singapore is an independently administered charity incepted in 1989 on a simple mission – to directly improve the health and well-being of children in Singapore. Find out more about RMHC Singapore:  http://rmhc.org.sg/
